definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Under the sunshine, the water of Kanas Lake is resplendent with colors.
sentences.chinese: 你看，在阳光的照射下，喀纳斯湖的湖水流光异彩。

sentences.english: Kanas Lake is located in Northern Xinjiang, China, forceful Johnson show, picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 喀纳斯湖位于中国新疆北部，雄浑娇秀，风景如画。

sentences.english: Why does the color of the Kanas Lake water change?
sentences.chinese: 喀纳斯湖的湖水为什么会变色呢？

sentences.english: But I believe this is just the mysterious part of Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 不过我想这可能就是喀纳斯湖的神秘之处吧。

sentences.english: Oh, I am full of expectations of Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，我对喀纳斯湖可是充满期待。
喀纳斯湖最明显的一个神秘特征。

sentences.english: Let's take a trip to the mysterious Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 让我们去寻访神秘的喀纳斯湖吧。

sentences.english: You thought it's all over after seeing the lake?
sentences.chinese: 你以为看完了喀纳斯湖就完事了？

sentences.english: Just wanted to share a few photos we took when we were filming in Buerjin and Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 一下在布尔津和喀纳斯湖录节目时拍的照片。

sentences.english: The breathtaking landscape is located in Burerjin County of Aletai area in Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 喀纳斯湖位于新疆阿勒泰地区布尔津县。

sentences.english: That's the first wooden bridge in the Kanas Lake area.
sentences.chinese: 那就是号称喀纳斯湖第一桥的木桥。
明天我们就会到达喀纳斯湖。

sentences.english: This is the upstream part of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 这里是喀纳斯湖的上游。

sentences.english: That's what is so mysterious about Lake Kanas.
sentences.chinese: 这就是喀纳斯湖的神秘之处。

sentences.english: After crossing over mountains and wading through rivers, Daniel and I have finally arrived at the beautiful Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我和大牛跋山涉水终于来到了美丽的喀纳斯湖。

sentences.english: The formation of the Kanas Lake is closely related to the glacial erosion and dam during the Last Glacial.
sentences.chinese: 喀纳斯湖的形成与末次冰期冰川作用关系密切。

definition: Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
Keketuohai town in Fuyun county 富蘊縣|富蕴县[Fu4 yun4 xian4], Altay prefecture, Xinjiang
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
Barkol grasslands near Hami in Xinjiang
Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet
Lake Bled, glacial lake amid the Julian Alps in Slovenia, adjacent to the town of Bled
Burqin county or Burchin nahiyisi in Altay prefecture 阿勒泰地區|阿勒泰地区[A1 le4 tai4 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
